name: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). 2009. Product List: Generic 100% Portland Cement
description:
DESCRIPTION
Description and life cycle inventory for the manufacture of concrete which uses 100% Portland Cement as the binder.

FULL CITATION
National Institute of Standards and Technology. 2009. Product List: Generic 100% Portland Cement. http://ws680.nist.gov/bees/ProductListFiles/Generic%20Concrete%20Products%20with%20Portland%20Cement.pdf (AccessedNovember 05, 2015).
